data.name: The Lost Abyss
data.detailed_description:
In the previously flourishing world, darkness has come. Warriors who fought for order and justice are now forced to fight for survival. The world is not the same as before, hunger and disease conquered civilians. You have to play the role of a warrior belonging to the ancient clan of elders and figure everything out.

A role-playing game where you have to adapt to the terrain and destroy various enemies, clearing the area from darkness. Choose the weapons that suit you and hit the road.

The Lost Abyss is a 2D top-down RPG where you have to complete quests and destroy monsters. You are presented with a huge world inhabited by various wickedness, as well as friendly nps. Move around the world, destroy monsters and bosses.

Take on the role of a fierce warrior: your task is to rid the world of those who pose a threat to civilians and their freedom.

People are starving and sick, the knights who cursed to protect the people turned against him. Put things in order, and bring justice to the previously flourishing world!
